name: Fighter
description: Fighters excel at combat - defeating their enemies, controlling the flow of battle, and surviving such sorties themselves. While their specific weapon and methods grant them a wide variety of tactics, few can match fighters for sheer battle prowess

archetypes.name: Aldori Defender
archetypes.description: The Aldori Defender is a master of the Aldori dueling sword, specializing in defensive combat techniques that allow them to parry and counterattack with precision.

archetypes.name: Armiger
archetypes.description: The Armiger is a skilled warrior who specializes in the use of heavy armor and shields, excelling in defensive tactics and battlefield control.

archetypes.name: Dragonheir Scion
archetypes.description: The Dragonheir Scion is a fighter with draconic heritage, granting them unique abilities and resilience in combat, often channeling the power of their dragon ancestors.

archetypes.name: Mutation Warrior
archetypes.description: The Mutation Warrior embraces biological mutations to enhance their combat abilities, gaining unique physical traits that provide advantages in battle.

archetypes.name: Tower Shield Specialist
archetypes.description: The Tower Shield Specialist is adept at using tower shields to provide exceptional defense for themselves and their allies, mastering techniques that turn the shield into a formidable weapon.

archetypes.name: Two-Handed Fighter
archetypes.description: The Two-Handed Fighter focuses on wielding large, two-handed weapons to deliver powerful strikes, sacrificing some defense for increased offensive capabilities.

name: Wizard
description: While universalist wizards might study  to prepare themselves for any manner of danger, specialist wizards research schools of magic that make them exceptionally skilled within a specific focus. Yet no matter their speciality, all wizards are masters of the impossible and can aid their allies in overcoming any danger.

archetypes.name: Arcane Bomber
archetypes.description: To many  wizards, the experimentation of the alchemist seems quaint, if not dangerous or frightening. A few wizards take up the secrets of the bomb, however, fusing alchemy with their already considerable magical power.

archetypes.name: Cruoromancer
archetypes.description: To many  wizards, the experimentation of the alchemist seems quaint, if not dangerous or frightening. A few wizards take up the secrets of the bomb, however, fusing alchemy with their already considerable magical power.

archetypes.name: Elemental Specialist
archetypes.description: To many  wizards, the experimentation of the alchemist seems quaint, if not dangerous or frightening. A few wizards take up the secrets of the bomb, however, fusing alchemy with their already considerable magical power.

name: Rogue
description: Rogues excelt at moving about unseen and catching foes unaware, and tend to avoid head-to-head combat. Their varied skills and abilities allow them to be highly versatile, with great variations in expertise existing between different rogues. Most, however, excel in overcoming hindrances of all types, form unlocking doors and disarming traps to outwitting magical hazards and conning dull-witted opponents.

archetypes.name: Dark Lurker
archetypes.description: Dark lurkers, also known as 'the hungry night,' use darkness as their ally.

archetypes.name: Eldritch Scoundrel
archetypes.description: Dark lurkers, also known as 'the hungry night,' use darkness as their ally.

name: Cleric
description: More than capable of upholding the honor of their deities in battle, clerics often prove stalwart and capable combatants. Their true strength lies in their capability to draw upon the power of their deities, whether to increase their own and their allies' prowess in battle, to vex their foes with divine magic, or to lend healing to companaions in need. As their powers are influenced bby their faith, all clerics must focus their worship upon a divine source.

archetypes.name: Angelfire Apostle
archetypes.description: Angelfire apostles use the powers of good to avoid violence when possible and cleanse both maladies and evil creatures with blinding flames.

archetypes.name: Crusader
